select a,b,c from(select to_char(enrolldate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as a, count(*) as b,sum(count(*)) over(order by to_char(enrolldate,'yyyy/mm/dd')) as c from member group by TO_CHAR(enrolldate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') order by a desc) where rownum<=5

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO,LISTAGG(BOARD_TITLE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY BOARD_TITLE) AS "PRODUCTS",ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE,RECIPIENT,RECI_ADDRESS,MEMBER_ID,RECI_PHONE,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_TOTAL_STATUS FROM ORDER_PRODUCT OP JOIN ORDER_DETAIL OD ON(OP.ORDER_NO=OD.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PRODUCT_NO=OD.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON(B.BOARD_NO=P.BOARD_NO) GROUP BY OP.ORDER_NO,ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE,RECIPIENT,RECI_ADDRESS,MEMBER_ID,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_TOTAL_STATUS,RECI_PHONE ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

select op.order_no, op.order_date,op.order_total_price,od.order_detail_no,b.board_title,od.product_quantity,od.product_price,od.product_option,od.status,img_Server_Name,merchantu_id,imp_uid from order_product op join pay p on(p.order_no=op.order_no) join order_detail od on(op.order_no=od.order_no) join product p on(od.product_no=p.product_no) join board b on(p.board_no=b.board_no) join img_repository i on(to_char(b.board_no)=i.img_key) where op.order_no=#{orNo} and img_level=0
select to_char(order_date) as A,count(*) as B from order_product where order_total_status='결제완료' group by to_char(order_date) order by to_char(order_date) desc

select pt.pro_topcate_name as A,count(pt.pro_topcate_name) as B from order_detail o join product p on(p.product_no=o.product_no) join product_sub_cate ps on (ps.pro_subcate_code=p.pro_subcate_code) left join product_top_cate pt on (ps.pro_topcate_code=pt.pro_topcate_code) where status!='주문취소' group by pt.pro_topcate_name
